inputs.name: X Amplitude
inputs.description: The amplitude in the X direction.

inputs.name: Y Amplitude
inputs.description: The amplitude in the Y direction.

inputs.name: Use HSS sections
inputs.description: A flag indicating whether HSS sections should be used.

outputs.name: Maximum Beam Length
outputs.description: The maximum length of a beam.

outputs.name: Minimum Beam Length
outputs.description: The minimum length of a beam.

outputs.name: Minimum Elevation
outputs.description: The minimum elevation of any beam's center line vertices.

outputs.name: Maximum Elevation
outputs.description: The maximum elevation of any beam's center line vertices.
